title: Obari
author: Obari
created_time: April 18, 2023, 03:27:53 PMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 05:41:48 PM by Obari
content: I'm so sorry this is coming late because of my health issues and I want to use this medium to say a very big thank you to all those who turned up at the shortest notice which is a prove that you guys truly love me ðŸ¥°Staying without a father for over seven years haven't been an easy one for me and my family and Sunday being the 16th of April made my late father seven year he has left us in this evil world but it was a thing of joy to have seen people turn up for me and at the shortest notice of invitation and I want to say that the Almighty God will bless and keep you all for me IJN.AMEN.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: My deepest condolences to you mate on the demise of your popsy 7 years ago. I say may his gentle soul rest in peace mate, Amen. BecauseÂ  I know how challenging life can be, not to talk less of in the hand of a single parent in this harsh economy, but there is a portion of the Bible that says "In all things never fail to give God the glory & thanks", for He alone knows why we are meant to face some challenges on life.So once again, I say may his gentle soul rest in peace. Amen

May your memories of your father bring you comfort and peace during this difficult time.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: I'm sorry for the great loss, but I pray that the good God that has kept you and your family for the 7 years will continue to keep you till enternity,Sorry for the loss op, may dad continue to rest till we meet on the Resurrection morning...

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: The Lord who have always been comforting you and your family will continue to comfort you all. He will always help His Children

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: To all those who took out time to respond and also sent out words of comfort and prayers, you wouldn't shade tears except it's tears of joy.I wan thank everybody wey turn up last Sunday and for privacy I no fit call names but no worry una face show and una don show me say una truly dey for me.God go forever bless una. Amen.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: You are not alone bro,the lord is your strength and he will keep on strengthening you to overcome the challenge of life. The demise of your Dad had made you strong to fend for yourself, so I will say that everything on earth works for the glory of God. God knows why he took him away from you 7 years ago. May his gentle soul rest in peace. AmenMy condolence.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on April 18, 2023, 03:27:53 PMI'm so sorry this is coming late because of my health issues and I want to use this medium to say a very big thank you to all those who turned up at the shortest notice which is a prove that you guys truly love me ðŸ¥°First of all, I appreciate the privacy wey you do so for this your thread, I love the fact you no go into details or exposing the privacy of members that took it upon themselves to honor your invitation. I like the fact no names were mentioned or picture were uploaded even though there were numerous of them taken. This na so appreciation post supposed be, we need to learn to take our privacy very seriously and make we no dey too do like we over sabi ourselves for this place before bad belle begin dey link ourselves together.Make we no forget say eye dey this place well well as dem dey believe say we Nigerian sabi do mango mango so dem dey find who be escape goat make dem use am get reputation or merits and also in trying to clean the forum off such members. Obari, may the spirit of your father continue resting in peace. E no easy to lose a father wey he breadwinner of the family. Una do well to do him remembrance. I believe anywhere wey him dey, him go dey smile upon the household as him know say him bring people together wey go carry the name of the family go far. RIP to him again.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: So sorry brother, I really feel sorry for you on this course. At last, wetin matter most na him be say you no give up despite all the challenges wey you face for life without a Father. This type of patience and determination na him most our Nigerians lack and they end up giving up along the process. Now wey you don come this far for your life, make you use all him good values to better yourself and continue to guide you in the process of life. Na the beginning of good days for you be this, and I see you becoming a great person in the future. All the best Obari. Sorry once again brother.
